settings.title: Alfa Laval LKB Butterfly Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval LKB Butterfly Valve offers a range of benefits for efficient flow control in hygienic applications:

  • Reliable and cost-effective: A dependable butterfly valve designed for flow control in piping systems across various hygienic applications, providing a cost-effective solution.
  • High-performance and Low Flow Resistance: With its substantial opening area and low flow resistance, this valve ensures high Kv value and low pressure drop, optimizing system performance.
  • Maintenance-friendly: The LKB Butterfly Valve is designed for easy maintenance, minimizing service downtime, especially for the flange version.
  • Space-saving and economical: Its space-saving and economical construction enables inline mounting in piping systems, saving valuable space and costs.

Choose between manual or automatic operation, using either a standard handle or pneumatic actuator. Widely used in the dairy, food, beverage, brewery, and other industries, the Alfa Laval LKB Butterfly Valve delivers reliable and efficient performance in hygienic applications.

settings.title: Alfa Laval LKB UltraPure Butterfly Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval LKB UltraPure Butterfly Valve offers a range of benefits for efficient flow control in hygienic applications:

  • Efficiently routes high-purity fluids without compromising product quality.
  • Low restriction flow due to high Kv values for smooth fluid passage.
  • Simplified validation procedures with the Alfa Laval Q-doc documentation package.
  • Effortless maintenance with only one wear part replacement at scheduled intervals.

Specifically designed for critical applications in the biotech and pharmaceutical industries, offering high hygiene standards, superior flow control, and easy maintenance.

settings.title: Alfa Laval LKB-F Butterfly Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval LKB-F Butterfly Valve offers a range of benefits for efficient flow control in hygienic applications:

  • Reliable flow regulation for low- to medium-viscosity processing fluids and high particle concentrations.
  • Effortless installation and alignment with flanges on both valve body ends.
  • High-performance quarter-turn shutoff valve, enhancing productivity.
  • Economical and straightforward maintenance with scheduled wear part replacement, no special tools or piping system dismantling needed.

Choose the LKB-F raises product quality and yield while reducing energy, water and cleaning media costs, especially in combination with the Alfa Laval ThinkTop V50 and V70 pulse seat clean function.

settings.title: Alfa Laval Unique Control LKB Butterfly Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval Unique Control LKB Butterfly Valve offers a range of benefits for efficient flow control in hygienic applications:

  • Improved flow control and enhanced process hygiene with Alfa Laval Unique Control LKB.
  • Maintenance-free actuator integrated with an intelligent control unit.
  • Efficiently controls the flow of processing fluids in applications with stringent hygiene requirements.
  • Easy setup enables quick upgrades of manual or pneumatic shut-off valves, five times faster than conventional solutions. Suitable for various industries, including dairy, food, beverage, and brewery.
